comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? Run the attached JS through the compiler. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Error through both the web interface and via php and curl. Please provide any additional information below. I posted about this yesterday here: http://groups.google.com/group/closure-compiler- discuss/browse_thread/thread/fe558bcb75e40440 I've narrowed the offending code down as much as I can to still reproduce the error. The error has something to do with the unused variables in the addListener functions. If I change: chrome.tabs.onSelectionChanged.addListener(function(tabId, selectInfo){ reset_idle(); }); to chrome.tabs.onSelectionChanged.addListener(function(){ reset_idle(); }); I get no error.
This issue was closed by revision r237.
